# HiddenText
- [Overview](#overview)
- [Props](#props)
- [Usage](#usage)
- [Related components](#related-components)
- [Feedback](#feedback)

## Overview
Hidden text helps us to create a text which is accessible to screen reader users but not to users who see the screen.
<Canvas>
  <Story name="Overview"
         args={ {text: "Hello hidden text"} }>
    { hiddenTextTemplate.bind({}) }
  </Story>
</Canvas>

## Props
<ArgsTable of={ HiddenText } />

## Usage
<UsageGuidelines guidelines={[
  "Use hidden text for writing a text which should be exposed to screen reader users only.",
]}/>

<Tip> If your text should be hidden from everyone please hide it by using CSS with "display: none" or "visibility: hidden".</Tip>
